page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content: I think of Castleford as a small mining town in West Yorkshire but deep in my heart I think of it as the biggest place in the world.Castleford has lots of factories.Many of them are very important like Mackintosh's and Hickson & Welsh but all these factories make the atmosphere in places rather polluted.In fact in some places you would get the idea that Castleford is rather a dull place.It has its own rugby team which you may have heard of.It has a very high range of leisure for a small town with night clubs,video shops and a very wide range of sports. Castleford is also the place where the River Calder and the River Aire meet.It also has a little bit of history to it.It was one of the main Roman strongholds.Also Henry Moore,a famous sculptor and artist,was born and raised here.
